dt-option.name: searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.data
dt-option.summary: Define the data point to be selected

type.description: The title of the data point to be selected.

dt-option.description:
This value defines which column the criteria will apply to, identified by its title. If the title has been change with `-init columns.title`, then the amended value must be used.
When using SSP, the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.origData` property must also be set so that the server-side script knows which field to filter on.
For more information on preDefined searches please refer to the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined` option or the [manual page](//datatables.net/extensions/searchbuilder/predefined).
